txt.en: Destroy the stone-claw nests within Klórgren ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The burrows of Klórgren can be found on the eastern edges of Elderslade.\n\nYou should destroy the stone-claw nests within Klórgren.
The burrows of Klórgren can be found on the eastern edges of Elderslade.\n\nYou should destroy the stone-claw nests within Klórgren.

Klórgren, the massive network of stone-claw tunnels and burrows, cracks the earth as the passages inside weave and twist through the hills. If the stone-claws are not removed from Klórgren, it is possible that the entire hill will collapse, making it near impossible for anyone else to pass further west into Elderslade.
The burrows of Klórgren are the cause of unstable earth in the eastern edges of Elderslade.
You have destroyed many stone-claw nests within Klórgren.

You have successfully destroyed many of the stone-claw burrows within Klórgren, forcing some of the stone-claws to depart the unstable tunnels. The dwarves coming to Elderslade will thank you for your efforts.
Destroy the stone-claw nests within Klórgren
